channel.title: RuneScape private Server Website.[almost ready for release]
channel.description:
I am creating a HTML, CSS and PHP Website to be used with a RuneScape Private Server.
Unlike other websites this one will not be a leech from RuneScapes StyleSheet. I have created my own custom stylesheet and i am creating the site 100% from scratch
[b]features[/b] Staff Applications - uses PHP form embeds into MYSQL database. Password Recovery - Uses Detailed PHP Form to prove account ownership. - Embeds into database Ban/Mute Appeals - uses PHP form and embeds into MYSQL Database 100% editable Easy for begginers
Current Development; I have made the home page and i am working on the other pages.
Picture: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/fwinfm.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:7, topic:336355”][quote author=Koolvin link=topic=432728.msg3176781#msg3176781 date=1270931386]
I don’t really like it, not to be mean, there is just too much going on, and it looks completely unprofessional.
[/quote]

Uhm, Thanks, it was my first complete CSS i made myself, i made it about 7 months ago too so its abit old… im not too good with stylesheets, I have released this now if you want to have a look its in the server downloads section[/quote]I’m solid with stylesheets, if you ever need any help with anything let me know =] I’m certified

item.title: RuneScape private Server Website.[almost ready for release]
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

marcbob:

Looks great

Thanks, I’m just adding finishing touches and then im releasing.

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:4, topic:336355”]You should fix the corner on the top left of the navigation. It’s rounded too wide, which makes it have that bad effect. Also, I’d prefer a more modern font.

Other than that, it looks pretty nice. :)[/quote]

I’m going to make a V2 using RuneScapes StyleSheets, I just knocked this together from a stylesheet i found on my laptop from a while back while i had no internet…

Read full topic

Other than that, it looks pretty nice.
